reviewText: This is good instruction for beginners and early intermediate players. The thing I didn't like about it is the title is misleading. It says," L earn to play in the styles of......" . I bought this hoping to learn some more advance guitar licks, but I was very disappointed with it. There's plenty of books and dvd instruction out there for more advanced players . If you are looking for a certain players style( Tony Rice, Doc Watson, or Norman Blake) ,don't waste your time on this one.
